Class Mqtt

All Implemented Interfaces:
MqttCallback
public class Mqtt
extends Service
implements MqttCallback

Service that connects to the MQTT P2P network for AWARE

Author:
denzil

Nested Class Summary
static class Mqtt.MqttProvider
          AWARE MQTT Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded MQTT messages and subscribed topics on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/mqtt.db

connectionLost

public void connectionLost(Throwable cause)
If connection is lost, try connecting again. If it fails again, turns off the service. AWARE monitoring services will bring it back again in 5 minutes.

Specified by:
connectionLost in interface MqttCallback
Parameters:
cause - the reason behind the loss of connection.

messageArrived

public void messageArrived(MqttTopic topic,
                           MqttMessage message)
                    throws Exception
New MQTT message has arrived - Sends the message as a broadcast for extensability - If the topic is on ESM, displays the ESM too.

Specified by:
messageArrived in interface MqttCallback
Parameters:
topic - the topic on which the message arrived.
message - the actual message.
Throws:
Exception - if a terminal error has occurred, and the client should be shut down.

deliveryComplete

public void deliveryComplete(MqttDeliveryToken token)
When the message was delivered successfully on the server Do nothing for now.

Specified by:
deliveryComplete in interface MqttCallback
Parameters:
token - the delivery token associated with the message.
